abstract: florida softball fan tragically dies after being struck with errant ball during game .
article: where one man once found love , his loved ones found heartbreak . greg fusco , who loved softball more than many , revolved his life around the sport . it 's where he spent his free time , it 's the reason why he traveled in order to participate in tournaments , and it 's even where he found his wife . unfortunately , the sport ended up taking his love . fusco was tragically pronounced dead following a line drive to the head during a game of softball . palm harbor softball lover dies after being hit during game @tb_times pic .

twitter . com/ejiakyagkl -- ron brackett december 22 , 2017 . that 's absolutely heartbreaking . fusco was pitching last week when he was immediately struck in the head by a comebacker . we 've seen that happen many times in major league baseball , which would lead you to assume something as horrible as this would n't be caused by a ball which is much softer . there is no positive way to take a life of a man who was just 37-years old , but having this tragedy occur on the diamond where he loved playing is nothing short of awful .
he was survived by his wife , who he married just one month before his sudden accident . our heart goes out to his family .
